short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select Elements on a webpage to view the element name and hide it from view! Export to CSV for your records.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly select elements on any webpage to reveal their corresponding names, then hide those elements from view with a simple click! This intuitive tool not only lets you manage the visibility of specific web elements but also allows you to export a detailed record of the selected elements to a CSV file for future reference or documentation. It's a seamless solution for developers, designers, or anyone looking to customize their web experience or gather insights from a webpage.
